verbs.description: EAST HAVEN -- In the aftermath of [ARG0: the North Haven barn explosion and standoff] [R-ARG0: that] [V: injured] [ARG1: several officers] , the East Haven Police Department is asking President Trump to visit .
EAST HAVEN -- In the aftermath of the North Haven barn explosion and standoff that injured several officers , the East Haven Police Department [V: is] asking President Trump to visit .

[ARGM-TMP: EAST HAVEN] -- [ARGM-TMP: In the aftermath of the North Haven barn explosion and standoff that injured several officers] , [ARG0: the East Haven Police Department] is [V: asking] [ARG2: President Trump] [ARG1: to visit] .
EAST HAVEN -- In the aftermath of the North Haven barn explosion and standoff that injured several officers , the East Haven Police Department is asking [ARG0: President Trump] to [V: visit] .
